text:
Listen, everyone!
The plans for our debut live have been approved!

Our discussions...
We talked about so many things...

Amazing... It's amazing!
I never thought it would come together like this...!

What everyone thought of,
I want to make it a reality as much as possible.
As expected of our producer, huh!

Oh?
The stage will have gear motifs, huh?

Gears turning, our story beginsâ€”
It's like the gears of fate, one might say.

Thinking about singing on that stage
makes me unable to contain my excitement~!

Yeah
Suddenly, it feels so real.

The stage is big
and it feels like it's going to be tiring-

Hehe, let's make the most of this large stage
and deliver a great performance!

Alright!
Once it's decided, let's start practicing right away!

Haha, I thought you might say that,
so I kept the rehearsal room empty for you.

Eh...
You don't need to worry about such things though.
